uk.co.saiman.data

Class IrregularSampledDomain<U extends javax.measure.Quantity<U>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • uk.co.saiman.data.IrregularSampledDomain<U>
  • Type Parameters:
    U - the type of the units of measurement of values in the domain
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Dimension<U>, Domain<U>, SampledDimension<U>, SampledDomain<U>

    public class IrregularSampledDomain<U extends javax.measure.Quantity<U>>
extends Object
implements SampledDomain<U>
    A partial-implementation of SampledContinuousFunction with regular intervals in the domain between samples.
